Provider to initiate this phase after adjusting antithymocyte globulin rabbit dose
Antithymocyte globulin rabbit dosing is 1 to 1.5 mg/kg, total 5 to 8 doses (cumulative maximum 8 mg/kg)
Consider reducing antithymocyte globulin rabbit if neutrophil count is between 1 to 1.5 x 10^9/L or platelet count is between 50 to 75 x 10^9/L
Consider holding antithymocyte globulin rabbit if neutrophil count is less than 1 x 10^9/L or platelet count is less than 50 x 10^9/L
